user_query: I want to recommend popular tracks from different genres and provide information about the artists, along with details on top concerts in the region.

TaskList.description: Research and compile a list of popular tracks from various music genres (e.g., rock, pop, jazz, etc.)
For each track identified, gather detailed information about the artist, including biographical information and discography.
Identify and compile a list of the top concerts happening in the region around the time of the event.
Summarize and organize the information from all previous tasks into a presentable format for the event.
